name: FlatLand Wars
description: In this tower defense game you  directly control main character and can destroy enemies just by shooting them, but you are encouraged to build some towers to help you in this task. Enemies in this game are existing in two dimensions 2d and 3d. You can't hurt 2d enemies from third dimension and vice versa. Towers are also divided on those that only attack 2d or 3d enemies.
